means: （美国的一州内）远离大城市的（地）
州内远离大城市的地区，州的北部

sentence.Network_en: The park was created to preserve some of the forests upstate.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个公园是为了保护该州最北部地区的一些森林而建的。

sentence.Network_en: These buses will carry families upstate to visit relatives in prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些公共汽车将载着家属北上去探监。

sentence.Network_en: They retired and went to live upstate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们退休后移居到州的乡野地区去了。

entry.tran: 州的最边远地区的；州的最北部地区的
entry.def: Upstate means belonging or relating to the parts of a state that are furthest to the north or furthest from the main city.

example.ex: ...an idyllic village in upstate New York.
example.tran: 纽约州最北部的一个恬静村庄

means.word_mean: 1. in or toward the northern parts of a state;
